rules.natural: If a team undertakes a field expedition, then provided that a grant provides research funding, it follows that under the condition that it is not the case that if a place is protected then an animal is endangered, a disease outbreak does not occur, which then implies that a monitoring program is established for the place.
Should an animal achieve breeding success, then population recovery for that animal follows.
In the event that poaching activity targets an animal, legal protection for that animal results.
Whenever poaching activity targets an animal, enforcement action by an agency occurs.
Assuming an agency takes enforcement action, an arrest of a poacher is made.
Whenever a poacher is arrested, it is not the case that the animal has legal protection.
If alcohol is contaminated, then on the condition that the grant is not approved for funding, an invasive plant exists.
Either alcohol is contaminated or a place is protected.
Either deforestation occurs at a place or a pollution incident at the place does not happen.
If a conservation order is issued for a place, then deforestation at that place does not occur.
If a ministry intervenes with government action, then an agency implements policy.
Either a ministry intervenes with government action or an organization provides international aid.
Provided that an organization provides international aid, either a public awareness campaign is conducted or, if poaching activity targets an animal, then the animal does not have legal protection.
Assuming an agency implements policy, a unit forms an enforcement team.
Provided that a unit forms an enforcement team, a team carries out a patrol operation.

Should a team carry out a patrol operation, then either a public awareness campaign is conducted or, if poaching activity targets an animal, then it is not the case that the animal has legal protection.
If an animal is endangered, then given that the grant is not approved for funding, an invasive plant exists.
Either a grant provides research funding or a reserve has a conservation budget.

If a reserve has a conservation budget, then under the condition that it is not the case that if a place is protected then an animal is endangered, a disease outbreak does not occur, which then implies that a monitoring program is established for the place.

If a team conducts a scientific study, then provided that a grant provides research funding, it follows that under the condition that it is not the case that if a place is protected then an animal is endangered, a disease outbreak does not occur, which then implies that a monitoring program is established for the place.
Either a team conducts a scientific study or a team undertakes a field expedition.
If it is not the case that either habitat destruction occurs in a place or the grant is approved for funding, then ecosystem collapse occurs at the place.
If it is not the case that if habitat restoration occurs at a place then the animal experiences population recovery, then a pollution incident occurs at the place.
If it is not the case that if a place is protected then an animal is endangered, then a disease outbreak occurs.

Provided that it is not the case that if it is not the case that either habitat destruction occurs in a place or the grant is approved for funding then ecosystem collapse at the place does not happen, the animal achieves breeding success.

In the event that it is not the case that if it is not the case that either habitat destruction occurs in a place or the grant is approved for funding then ecosystem collapse at the place does not happen, habitat restoration occurs at the place.

Should it not be the case that if it is not the case that either habitat destruction occurs in a place or the grant is approved for funding then ecosystem collapse at the place does not happen, then it is not the case that the animal experiences population recovery.

Provided that it is not the case that if it is not the case that if a place is protected then an animal is endangered then a disease outbreak does not occur, a monitoring program for the place is not established.
In the case that the grant is not approved for funding, poaching activity targets an animal.
